import React from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const Header = ({article}) => { const location = useLocation().pathname; return (
{location === '/login' && <>

Login

로그인하셈ㅋ } {location === '/' && <>

Articles

게시물들임ㅋ } {location === '/signup' && <>

Sign Up

가입하셈ㅋ } {location === '/article/post' && <>

Posting

올리셈ㅋ } {location.indexOf('/article/') !== -1 && article? <> {console.log(article)}

{article.title}

Posted by {article.author.n_name} on {moment(article.date).format('YYYY-MM-DD, hh:mm')} {console.log(article)} : null }
) } export default Header;
